item.title: Approaching the Throne of God with Confidence
item.description:
Approaching the Throne of God with Confidence by Elder Jörg Klebingat, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 184th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 2014
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Jörg Klebingat, Of the Seventy

item.title: Valiant Discipleship in the Latter Days
item.description:
Valiant Discipleship in the Latter Days by Elder Jörg Klebingat, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 192nd Annual General Conference on Thu Mar 31 2022
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
